metadata.Title: CVE-2014-7295 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description:
The (1) Special:Preferences and (2) Special:UserLogin pages in MediaWikibefore 1.19.20, 1.22.x before 1.22.12 and 1.23.x before 1.23.5 allowsremote authenticated users to conduct cross-site scripting (XSS) attacks orhave unspecified other impact via crafted CSS, as demonstrated by modifyingMediaWiki:Common.css.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-7295` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mediawiki - 1:1.19.20+dfsg-1
mediawiki-classes - 1:1.19.20+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: mediawiki package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:1.19.20+dfsg-1').
